idea: Eureka Digitisation and Automation Services Private Limited (eDAS) is evolving and endavors to become the preferred IT Solutions Provider to Large, Medium as well as Small Scale organizations. Prior to occurrence of the pandemic, organizations were used to conventional employee on-boarding process. Through eDAS, we have innovatively designed a ‘Digital On-boarding Solution’. This is one of the ‘Best-in-Class’ solutions and unique in many ways since it comes as an End-to-End solution that is capable of managing the complete ‘HR On-boarding Cycle’ for any industry. Considering a situation of any force majeure or pandemic occurrence, any organization would not be faced with challenges of managing the HR on-boarding through ‘brick-and-mortar’ process. This solution helps in overcoming many such challenges as various stages of this value-chain can now be digitally handled, right from digital availability of candidate resumes, step-by-step tracking of candidate selection right up to offer letter being digitally signed and mailed across to the prospective candidate, amongst other features like digital attendance of the employee, leave management, etc.
name: EUREKA DIGITISATION & AUTOMATION SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are working on the BIRAC-supported project with the objective to develop a medical device for children born with a congenital heart defect (CHD) wherein the heart has a single functional ventricle pumping a mixture of deoxygenated blood and oxygenated blood. The only option for such patients is the Fontan operation which is a palliative procedure that connects the superior vena cava (SVC) from the upper body and inferior vena cava (IVC) from the lower body directly with the pulmonary artery. However, at a later stage, the Fontan circulation tends to fail due to unequal distribution of the hepatic content-rich IVC blood to both the lungs resulting in the lung developmental problem. We are developing an implantable caval flow assist device that will standardize the surgery and regulate the blood flow thereby preventing the failing Fontan circulation.
name: AUFLOWS CARDIOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED
